InstructionData.Title: Prime Encoder
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Prime Bit Encoder​ # Model: PBE-100​ alias Bit0 d0​ alias Bit1 d1​ alias Bit2 d2​ alias Bit3 d3​ alias Bit4 d4​ alias Bit5 d5​ # primes=3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17​ start:​ move r0 1​ l r1 Bit0 Setting​ brlez r1 2​ mul r0 r0 3​ l r1 Bit1 Setting​ brlez r1 2​ mul r0 r0 5​ ​l r1 Bit2 Setting​ brlez r1 2​ mul r0 r0 7​ ​l r1 Bit3 Setting​ brlez r1 2​ mul r0 r0 11​ ​l r1 Bit4 Setting​ brlez r1 2​ mul r0 r0 13​ ​​l r1 Bit5 Setting​ brlez r1 2​ mul r0 r0 17​ ​s db Setting r0​ ​yield​ j start
